column4: Hey there im still having trouble finding a walkthrough for installing windows xp after ive initially installed ubuntu, is there any that anyone here know's of? im using the same HD, so i will have to partition
i'd just like to install windows now, but not sure how to go about this, i tried ubotu grub, but i cant really make sense of it :S
its easier if you install windows first and leave some hdd space unpartitioned. Grub will be your bootloader and chainload windows if selected
